languages.text: {n}Затем взгляд губернатора падает на одеяния Кибеллы, и зрачки его расширяются. Осторожно, вкрадчиво он добавляет:{/n} "Эта... женщина — ваша телохранительница? Или вы явились, чтобы кто-то..." {n}Губернатор умолкает, так и не решившись закончить вопрос.{/n}

{n}Then the governor notices Kibellah's clothes, and his eyes go wide. He adds, softly and cautiously,{/n} "This... woman, she is your bodyguard, I presume? Or is she here to..." {n}He stops, choosing not to finish his question.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Затем взгляд губернатора падает на одеяния Кибеллы, и зрачки его расширяются. Осторожно, вкрадчиво он добавляет:{/n} "Эта... женщина — ваша телохранительница? Или вы явились, чтобы кто-то..." {n}Губернатор умолкает, так и не решившись закончить вопрос.{/n}

{n}Then the governor notices Kibellah's clothes, and his eyes go wide. He adds, softly and cautiously,{/n} "This... woman, she is your bodyguard, I presume? Or is she here to..." {n}He stops, choosing not to finish his question.{/n}

{n}Then the governor notices Kibellah's clothes, and his eyes go wide. He adds, softly and cautiously,{/n} "This... woman, she is your bodyguard, I presume? Or is she here to..." {n}He stops, choosing not to finish his question.{/n}

{n}Then the governor notices Kibellah's clothes, and his eyes go wide. He adds, softly and cautiously,{/n} "This... woman, she is your bodyguard, I presume? Or is she here to..." {n}He stops, choosing not to finish his question.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El gobernador se fija en la ropa de Kibellah. Abre los ojos de par en par y añade en voz baja y con cautela:{/n} «¿Esta... mujer es su guardaespaldas? ¿O ha venido a...?». {n}Se detiene, dejando la pregunta en el aire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Then the governor notices Kibellah's clothes, and his eyes go wide. He adds, softly and cautiously,{/n} "This... woman, she is your bodyguard, I presume? Or is she here to..." {n}He stops, choosing not to finish his question.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador se fija en la ropa de Kibellah. Abre los ojos de par en par y añade en voz baja y con cautela:{/n} «¿Esta... mujer es su guardaespaldas? ¿O ha venido a...?». {n}Se detiene, dejando la pregunta en el aire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}そして知事はキベラの服装に気づき、目を見開いた。彼は、柔らかくも注意深く、付け加えた。{/n}「この…女性は、あなたのボディーガードですね？それとも彼女はここで…」{n}彼は言葉を止め、質問をしないことにした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Then the governor notices Kibellah's clothes, and his eyes go wide. He adds, softly and cautiously,{/n} "This... woman, she is your bodyguard, I presume? Or is she here to..." {n}He stops, choosing not to finish his question.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}そして知事はキベラの服装に気づき、目を見開いた。彼は、柔らかくも注意深く、付け加えた。{/n}「この…女性は、あなたのボディーガードですね？それとも彼女はここで…」{n}彼は言葉を止め、質問をしないことにした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}随后，总督立刻注意到了绮贝菈的装束。他瞪大了眼睛，以温和而谨慎的声音补充道。{/n}“这位……女士，我猜她应该是您的保镖吧？还是说，她是来……”{n}他住了口，没有把问题问完。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Then the governor notices Kibellah's clothes, and his eyes go wide. He adds, softly and cautiously,{/n} "This... woman, she is your bodyguard, I presume? Or is she here to..." {n}He stops, choosing not to finish his question.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}随后，总督立刻注意到了绮贝菈的装束。他瞪大了眼睛，以温和而谨慎的声音补充道。{/n}“这位……女士，我猜她应该是您的保镖吧？还是说，她是来……”{n}他住了口，没有把问题问完。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dann bemerkt der Gouverneur Kibellahs Kleidung, und seine Augen weiten sich. Leise und vorsichtig fügt er hinzu:{/n} "Diese ... Frau ist wohl Eure Leibwächterin, nehme ich an? Oder ist sie hier, um ...?" {n}Er hält inne und beendet seine Frage nicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Then the governor notices Kibellah's clothes, and his eyes go wide. He adds, softly and cautiously,{/n} "This... woman, she is your bodyguard, I presume? Or is she here to..." {n}He stops, choosing not to finish his question.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dann bemerkt der Gouverneur Kibellahs Kleidung, und seine Augen weiten sich. Leise und vorsichtig fügt er hinzu:{/n} "Diese ... Frau ist wohl Eure Leibwächterin, nehme ich an? Oder ist sie hier, um ...?" {n}Er hält inne und beendet seine Frage nicht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Puis, le gouverneur remarque les vêtements de Kibellah et ses yeux s'écarquillent. Il baisse d'un ton et poursuit d'une voix circonspecte :{/n} « Cette... femme, c'est votre garde du corps, je présume ? Ou est-elle là pour... » {n}Il s'interrompt, hésitant à aller au bout de sa question.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Then the governor notices Kibellah's clothes, and his eyes go wide. He adds, softly and cautiously,{/n} "This... woman, she is your bodyguard, I presume? Or is she here to..." {n}He stops, choosing not to finish his question.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Puis, le gouverneur remarque les vêtements de Kibellah et ses yeux s'écarquillent. Il baisse d'un ton et poursuit d'une voix circonspecte :{/n} « Cette... femme, c'est votre garde du corps, je présume ? Ou est-elle là pour... » {n}Il s'interrompt, hésitant à aller au bout de sa question.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vali, ardından dikkatini Kibellah'nın kıyafetlerine çeviriyor. Gözleri fal taşı gibi açılıyor. Yumuşak ve temkinli bir tonda konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Bu... Kadının korumanız olduğunu varsayıyorum. Yoksa buraya..." {n}Sorusunu bitirmemeye karar vererek duraksıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Then the governor notices Kibellah's clothes, and his eyes go wide. He adds, softly and cautiously,{/n} "This... woman, she is your bodyguard, I presume? Or is she here to..." {n}He stops, choosing not to finish his question.{/n}
